alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 12 at 11:01AM MDT until April 12 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds around 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County including Cheyenne. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
